00019 class simbio_sqlite_field_info
00029 {
00030     public $name;
00031     public $type;
00032 
00036     public function __construct()
00037     {
00038         // just do nothing
00039     }
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 class simbio_sqlite_result extends simbio
00044 {
00048     private $res_result = false;
00049     private $sql_string = '';
00050 
00054     public $num_rows = 0;
00055     public $field_count = 0;
00056     public $affected_rows = 0;
00057     public $insert_id = 0;
00058     public $errno = 0;
00059 
00066     public function __construct($str_query, $res_conn)
00067     {
00068         $this->sql_string = trim($str_query);
00069         $this->sendQuery($res_conn);
00070     }
00071 
00072 
00079     private function sendQuery($res_conn)
00080     {
00081         // checking query type
00082         // if the query return recordset or not
00083         if (preg_match("/^(SELECT)\s/i", $this->sql_string)) {
00084             $this->res_result = @sqlite_query($res_conn, $this->sql_string);
00085             // error checking
00086             if (!$this->res_result) {
00087                 $this->errno = sqlite_last_error($res_conn);
00088                 $this->error = "Query failed to executed. Please check your query again. \n".sqlite_error_string($this->errno);
00089             } else {
00090                 // count number of rows
00091                 $this->num_rows = @sqlite_num_rows($this->res_result);
00092             }
00093         } else {
00094             $_query = @sqlite_unbuffered_query($res_conn, $this->sql_string);
00095             $this->insert_id = sqlite_last_insert_rowid($res_conn);
00096             // error checking
00097             if (!$_query) {
00098                 $this->errno = sqlite_last_error($res_conn);
00099                 $this->error = "Query failed to executed. Please check your query again. \n".sqlite_error_string($this->errno);
00100             } else {
00101                 // get number of affected row
00102                 $this->affected_rows = @sqlite_changes($res_conn);
00103             }
00104             // nullify query
00105             $_query = null;
00106         }
00107     }
00108 
00109 
00115     public function fetch_assoc()
00116     {
00117         return sqlite_fetch_array($this->res_result, SQLITE_ASSOC);
00118     }
00119 
00120 
00126     public function fetch_row()
00127     {
00128         return sqlite_fetch_array($this->res_result, SQLITE_NUM);
00129     }
00130 
00131 
00137     public function fetch_fields()
00138     {
00139         $_fields_info = array();
00140         $_f = 0;
00141         $_field_num = sqlite_num_fields($this->res_result);
00142         while ($_f < $_field_num) {
00143             $field_obj = new simbio_sqlite_field_info();
00144             $field_obj->name = sqlite_field_name($this->res_result, $_f);
00145             $field_obj->type = 'VARCHAR';
00146             $_fields_info[] = $field_obj;
00147             $_f++;
00148         }
00149         return $_fields_info;
00150     }
00151 
00152 
00158     public function free_result()
00159     {
00160         if ($this->res_result) {
00161             unset($this->res_result);
00162         }
00163     }
00164 }
